comment: She is THE MOST caring professor I had this semester. There were no quizzes or tests and the final was just a project. Discussions are really insightful and she definitely prepares you for your journey at KSU.

If you have a passion for liberal arts classes, then you'll like the class. If you are taking this class just because it's required, then it may seem very boring. There are two tests, a lot of group projects, and a lot of assignments involving taking selfies. Lots of class discussions. If you take a lot of notes you won't need the textbook.
